title: How trade wars hurt gadget makers
description: On the season finale of In The Making, Ashley Carman talks to gadget makers and creators about how political policies around tariffs affect their businesses. Theyre subject to the whims of politicians, just like everybody else, and the repercussions could impact us, the consumers.
